downloadTitle: Microsoft SQL Server Data Tools - Business Intelligence for Visual Studio 2013
downloadDescription: Installs Microsoft SQL Server Data Tools Business Intelligence project templates for Analysis Services, Integration Services, and Reporting Services that support Visual Studio 2013.
detailsSection: Installs Microsoft SQL Server Data Tools Business Intelligence project templates for Analysis Services, Integration Services, and Reporting Services that support Visual Studio 2013 and SQL Server 2014.
systemRequirementsSection:
• Supported architectures:
    • 32-bit (x86)
    • 64-bit (x64)

  • Hardware requirements:
    • 1.6 GHz or faster processor
    • 4 GB of RAM (4.5 GB if running on a virtual machine)
    • 10 GB (NTFS) of available hard disk space
    • DirectX 9-capable video card running at 1024 x 768 or higher display resolution

  • Prerequisites:
    • Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.1
    • Microsoft Visual Studio 2012 Shell (Isolated) Redistributable Package
    • Microsoft Visual Studio 2012 Shell (Integrated) Redistributable Package
    • Microsoft Visual Studio 2013 Shell (Isolated) Redistributable Package
    • Microsoft Visual Studio 2013 Shell (Integrated) Redistributable Package
    • Microsoft Visual Studio Tools for Applications 2012
    • Microsoft Report Viewer 2014 Runtime
installInstructionSection:
1. On this page, click Download to start the download.
2. To save the download on your computer so that you can install it later, click Save.
3. To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
additionalInformationSection:
Installing SQL Server Data Tools - Business Intelligence for Visual Studio 2013 also installs the following, if they are not already installed on the computer:
  • Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.1
  • Microsoft Visual Studio 2012 Shell (Isolated) Redistributable Package
  • Microsoft Visual Studio 2012 Shell (Integrated) Redistributable Package
  • Microsoft Visual Studio 2013 Shell (Isolated) Redistributable Package
  • Microsoft Visual Studio 2013 Shell (Integrated) Redistributable Package
  • Microsoft Visual Studio Tools for Applications 2012
  • Microsoft Report Viewer 2014 Runtime
What's new in this version:
  • SSDT BI is enhanced to support VS 2013
